No Projects Found Message: No projects found. Add a new project or scan a folder.
Please select a project message: Please select a project from the list first.
Input error empty fields message: Project Name, Local Path, and Repository URL cannot be empty.
Selected project data not found error: Selected project data could not be found.
Confirm soft delete message: Are you sure you want to remove this project from the list? The files will NOT be deleted from your disk.
Confirm physical delete message: WARNING: This will PERMANENTLY delete the project folder '{path}' from your disk. This action CANNOT be undone. Are you absolutely sure?
help.title: InstallerPro Help
help.content: This application helps you manage your local Git projects.
help.not_available_placeholder: Help information for this item is not yet available.
Project is already up-to-date message: The selected project is already up-to-date.
Project Updated Success message: The selected project has been successfully updated.
Project is already up-to-date (no change: Project is already up-to-date. No changes to push.
All project statuses refreshed message: All project statuses have been successfully refreshed.
tooltip.project_name_entry: Enter a unique and descriptive name for your project.
tooltip.local_path_entry: Specify the full path to the project folder. If cloning a new project, this directory will be created if it doesn't exist.
tooltip.repo_url_entry: Paste the full URL of the Git repository here. This is required to clone or sync with a remote.
tooltip.branch_entry: Enter the name of the remote branch you want to work with. If empty, the repository's default will be used.
tooltip.stage_all_button: Prepares/Unprepares all changed files to be included in the next save (commit).
tooltip.commit_button: Saves the prepared changes with the provided message into the local project history.
tooltip.push_button: Uploads all your saved local commits to the remote repository (e.g., GitHub).
System language not supported: System language '{detected}' not supported or detection failed. Falling back to '{fallback}'.
Critical language failure: CRITICAL: Could not set language to '{lang}'. UI may display keys instead of text.
Config language updated: Config language preference updated from '{old}' to '{new}' due to fallback.
Language change success log: Preference set to '{pref}'. Active language now: '{active}'. Was: '{old}'.
Error loading translations message: Error loading translations for '{lang}'. Fallback active: '{fallback}'.
Critical language change failure log: CRITICAL: Failed to change language to '{lang}'. Fallback active: '{fallback}'.
Reverting to previous language log: Attempting to revert to previous language: {lang}
Unexpected error during scan setup messa: An unexpected error occurred during scan setup: {error}
Project Added And Cloned Success message: Project '{project}' was successfully added and cloned to '{path}'.
Project Marked as Deleted message: Project '{project}' has been marked as deleted.
Project Physically Removed Success messa: Project '{project}' was successfully removed from your disk.
Scan complete found new projects message: Scan complete. Found {count} new Git repositories.
Commit panel placeholder: Select a modified project to see changes here.
Commit panel placeholder clean: Project is clean. Nothing to commit.
No files staged for commit message: No files are prepared for commit. Please select at least one file.
Commit success message: Your changes have been successfully saved to the local history.
Security warning message:
Potential secrets detected in the files you are about to commit.

Details:
{details}
